short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can copy selected text and save it, when you need it back you can display copied items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save copied texts and browse then when needed. The saved texts can be copied and deleted again. It is helpful for the users want to store and get back texts copied.
